          <title>
            <string language="en">The lysozyme enzyme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Lysozymenzym</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'enzyme de lysozyme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O enzyme do lysozyme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'enzima del lisozima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το lysozyme ένζυμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La enzima del lysozyme</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how lysozyme destroys a bacterium by attacking its cell wall.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cell wall</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie Lysozym ein Bakterium 
zerstört, indem es seine Zellwand in Angriff nimmt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment le lysozyme détruit 
une bactérie en attaquant son mur de cellules.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como o lysozyme destrói uma
bactéria atacando sua parede de pilha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come il lisozima 
distrugge un batterio attacando la relativa parete delle 
cellule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς lysozyme 
καταστρέφει ένα βακτηρίδιο με να επιτεθεί στον τοίχο κυττάρων 
του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo el lysozyme destruye 
una bacteria atacando su pared de célula.</string>
          </description>
